Description: Fragment of a black figure (?) pottery amphora; low flaring ring foot; black glaze on outside with two stripes in added red at lower edge. Hard, orange/brown clay, between Munsell 2.5YR 6/6 (light red) and Munsell 5YR 6/3 (light reddish brown); fine mica, few dark and white inclusions.
Curator's comments: Joins BM GR 2010,5002.49. Compare with BM GR 1888,0208.71.a
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 354)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.127, p.129, p.226, pl.68)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
